de.iss.mv2.messaging

Class EncryptedMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.messaging.MV2CommunicationElement
      • de.iss.mv2.messaging.MV2Message
        • de.iss.mv2.messaging.EncryptedMessage

  • public class EncryptedMessage
extends MV2Message
    Represents an encrypted message.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

      • encrypt

        public static EncryptedMessage encrypt(MV2Message m,
                                       MessageCryptorSettings settings,
                                       java.security.PublicKey key,
                                       boolean skipIfEncypted)
        Encrypts a given message.
        Parameters:
        m - The message to encrypt.
        settings - The settings to use for encryption.
        key - The public key of the receiver.
        skipIfEncypted - true if the encryption should be skipped if the given message is already encrypted.
        Returns:
        The encrypted message.
